verses.name: Acts 21:34
verses.text: And some cried one thing, some another, among the multitude: and when he could not know the certainty for the tumult, he commanded him to be carried into the castle.

verses.name: Acts 21:35
verses.text: And when he came upon the stairs, so it was, that he was borne of the soldiers for the violence of the people.

verses.name: Acts 21:36
verses.text: For the multitude of the people followed after, crying, Away with him.

verses.name: Acts 21:37
verses.text: And as Paul was to be led into the castle, he said unto the chief captain, May I speak unto thee? Who said, Canst thou speak Greek?
